title: Verify Inline Policy Edit and Apply workflow selecting all categories and activities
custom_summary:
Verify Inline Policy Edit and Apply workflow selecting all categories and activities

Ref: https://netskope.atlassian.net/browse/ENG-258312
custom_steps:

Edit Inline Policy ( Update source and destination criteria )
Apply
custom_expected:
Inline Policy should be updated after edit operation.


Not Automatable, as it takes a lot of time using script due to which it effects the execution time and also more prone to failure
